languages.text: Вам будут встречаться враги с разными {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g}, умениями и свойствами. Иконка рядом с портретом противника сообщает, что он находится под воздействием какого-либо {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g}. Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель инициативы слева. Затем выберите противника с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и нажмите {console_bind|Func01}. В открывшемся окне информации о противнике выделите эффект и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы подробнее о нем узнать.

traits.locale_text:
Вам будут встречаться враги с разными способностями, умениями и свойствами. Иконка статуса рядом с портретом противника сообщает, что он находится под воздействием какого-то эффекта. Нажмите {console_bind|???}, чтобы активировать панель трекера хода слева, затем выберите противника, чтобы посмотреть его описание и статусы.
Если вы хотите изучить противника подробнее, удерживайте {console_bind|RightStickButton}.

languages.text: You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.
languages.original_text: Вам будут встречаться враги с разными {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g}, умениями и свойствами. Иконка рядом с портретом противника сообщает, что он находится под воздействием какого-либо {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g}. Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель инициативы слева. Затем выберите противника с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и нажмите {console_bind|Func01}. В открывшемся окне информации о противнике выделите эффект и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы подробнее о нем узнать.

traits.locale_text:
You will encounter enemies with various abilities and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of effect. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left. Then select an enemy whose description and status you would like to inspect.
If you wish to learn even more about the enemy, hold {console_bind|Confirm}.

You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy whose description and status you would like to inspect.
If you wish to learn even more about the enemy, hold {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text: Encontrarás a enemigos con {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y características para dar y regalar. Junto a la imagen del enemigo aparece un icono que indica que le afecta alguna clase de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g}. Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}iniciativa{/g} a la izquierda. A continuación, selecciona al enemigo con {console_bind|DPadVertical} y pulsa {console_bind|Func01}. Se abrirá una ventana de información de personaje. Selecciona el efecto y pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para saber más al respecto.
languages.original_text: You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text: Encontrarás a enemigos con {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y características para dar y regalar. Junto a la imagen del enemigo aparece un icono que indica que le afecta alguna clase de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g}. Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}iniciativa{/g} a la izquierda. A continuación, selecciona al enemigo con {console_bind|DPadVertical} y pulsa {console_bind|Func01}. Se abrirá una ventana de información de personaje. Selecciona el efecto y pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para saber más al respecto.

languages.text: ゲームでは様々な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や特徴を持った敵に遭遇する。敵のポートレートの横にあるアイコンは、その敵が何らかの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}の影響下にあることを示している。{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して、左にある{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}パネルを起動する。次に、{console_bind|DPadVertical}を使って説明やステータスを手に入れたい敵を選択し、{console_bind|Func01}を押す。さらに詳しい情報を知るには、開いたキャラクター情報ウィンドウ内で効果を選択し、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押す。
languages.original_text: You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text: ゲームでは様々な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や特徴を持った敵に遭遇する。敵のポートレートの横にあるアイコンは、その敵が何らかの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}の影響下にあることを示している。{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して、左にある{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}パネルを起動する。次に、{console_bind|DPadVertical}を使って説明やステータスを手に入れたい敵を選択し、{console_bind|Func01}を押す。さらに詳しい情報を知るには、開いたキャラクター情報ウィンドウ内で効果を選択し、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押す。

languages.text: 您所遇到的敌人会拥有各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与特性，敌人头像旁边的图标表示该名敌人正在受到某种{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}的影响。按{console_bind|LeftStickButton}打开左侧的{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}面板，之后通过{console_bind|DPadVertical}按下{console_bind|Func01}，选择任意一名敌人。在敌人的信息面板中，选择想要了解的效果，按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}，即可了解该效果的详细说明。
languages.original_text: You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text: 您所遇到的敌人会拥有各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与特性，敌人头像旁边的图标表示该名敌人正在受到某种{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}的影响。按{console_bind|LeftStickButton}打开左侧的{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}面板，之后通过{console_bind|DPadVertical}按下{console_bind|Func01}，选择任意一名敌人。在敌人的信息面板中，选择想要了解的效果，按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}，即可了解该效果的详细说明。

languages.text: Du wirst auf Feinde mit unterschiedlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und Eigenschaften treffen. Ein Symbol neben dem Porträt eines Gegners zeigt an, dass er unter dem Einfluss eines bestimmten {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektes{/g} steht. Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g}-Menü auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren. Wähle dann einen Gegner mit {console_bind|DPadVertical} aus und drücke {console_bind|Func01}. Wähle im Charakterinformation-Fenster, das sich nun öffnen, den Effekt aus und drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um mehr darüber zu erfahren.
languages.original_text: You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text: Du wirst auf Feinde mit unterschiedlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und Eigenschaften treffen. Ein Symbol neben dem Porträt eines Gegners zeigt an, dass er unter dem Einfluss eines bestimmten {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektes{/g} steht. Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g}-Menü auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren. Wähle dann einen Gegner mit {console_bind|DPadVertical} aus und drücke {console_bind|Func01}. Wähle im Charakterinformation-Fenster, das sich nun öffnen, den Effekt aus und drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um mehr darüber zu erfahren.

languages.text: Vous rencontrerez des ennemis dotés de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de caractéristiques diverses. La présence d'une icône à côté du portrait d'un ennemi indique qu'il est sous le coup d'un certain type d'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}. Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau d'{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} de gauche, puis sélectionnez un ennemi avec {console_bind|DPadVertical} et appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}. Dans la fenêtre d'informations sur le personnage qui s'affiche, sélectionnez l'effet et appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour en savoir plus.
languages.original_text: You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text: Vous rencontrerez des ennemis dotés de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de caractéristiques diverses. La présence d'une icône à côté du portrait d'un ennemi indique qu'il est sous le coup d'un certain type d'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}. Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau d'{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} de gauche, puis sélectionnez un ennemi avec {console_bind|DPadVertical} et appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}. Dans la fenêtre d'informations sur le personnage qui s'affiche, sélectionnez l'effet et appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour en savoir plus.

languages.text: Farklı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve özelliklere sahip düşmanlarla karşılaşacaksın. Bir düşmanın portresinin yanındaki simge, onun bir tür {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkiye{/g} maruz kaldığını gösterir. {console_bind|LeftStickButton} düğmesine basarak soldaki {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}öncelik{/g} panelini etkinleştir. Ardından {console_bind|DPadVertical} ve {console_bind|Func01} ile bir düşmanı seç. Açılan karakter bilgi penceresinden etkiyi seç ve {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesine basarak o etki hakkında daha fazla bilgi edin.
languages.original_text: You will encounter enemies with various {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and features. An icon next to an enemy's portrait indicates that they are under the influence of some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left. Then select an enemy using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and press {console_bind|Func01}. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it.
